description:
---

### [choco://simple-sticky-notes](choco://simple-sticky-notes)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

![Screenshot of Simple Sticky Notes](http://www.simplestickynotes.com/images/simple-sticky-notes-screenshot-2.png)	

What is Simple Sticky Notes? It's a simple, easy-to-use, absolutely free, fast and efficient note taking software.

Minimum Requirements: Windows® 11 / 10 / 8.1 / 8 / 7 / Vista / XP PC with a 1 GHz Intel or AMD processor and 512 MB of RAM

**SOCIAL MEDIA:**
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/SimpleStickyNotes) | [Google+](https://plus.google.com/+SimpleStickyNotes) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SimpleSticky)

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/simple-sticky-notes/readme.md)**

---

**Click here to [Patreon-ize](https://www.patreon.com/bcurran3) the package maintainer.**

---
summary: Simple Sticky Notes - fast free sticky notes for your Windows desktop.
author: Simnet Limited
